---
title: "ds4ling slides"
output: github_document
---

```{r, 'download-bib', echo=F}
link <- "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/jvcasillas/syllabi/master/589/refs/bib/ds4ling_refs.bib?token=AANKQ7EWSXKTW6I74R4NAZDABDXB4"

download.file(link, 
              destfile = here::here("assets", "bib", "ds4ling_refs.bib"), 
              method = "curl")
```

```{r, 'links-to-slides', echo=F, results='asis'}
base <- "https://ds4ling.github.io/slides/"
slides <- c(
  "01_getting_started", "02_distributions", "03_nhst", "04_correlation",
  "05_lm/01_bivariate_regression", "05_lm/02_assumptions_diagnostics", 
  "05_lm/03_mrc", "05_lm/04_general_linear_model", "05_lm/05_model_tuning", 
  "06_glm", "07_residuals")

glue::glue("1. [{slides}]({base}{slides}/)")[1]

```
